What is the purpose of the `getspentinfo` command, and how does it work if you only provide the `txid` argument?

The `getspentinfo` command returns the txid and index where an output is spent, but it requires both the `txid` and `index` arguments to function correctly. If you only provide the `txid` argument, the command will not work as intended. The correct usage of the command is to provide both the `txid` and `index` arguments, like this: `verus getspentinfo '{"txid": "0437cd7f8525ceed2324359c2d0ba26006d92d856a9c20fa0241106ee5a597c9", "index": 0}'`.

getspentinfo

Returns the txid and index where an output is spent.

Arguments:
{
 "txid" (string) The hex string of the txid
 "index" (number) The start block height
}

Result:
{
 "txid" (string) The transaction id
 "index" (number) The spending input index
 ,...
}

Examples:
> verus getspentinfo '{"txid": "0437cd7f8525ceed2324359c2d0ba26006d92d856a9c20fa0241106ee5a597c9", "index": 0}'
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getspentinfo", "params": [{"txid": "0437cd7f8525ceed2324359c2d0ba26006d92d856a9c20fa0241106ee5a597c9", "index": 0}] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
Can I use the `getspentinfo` command to get information about unspent outputs?

No, the `getspentinfo` command is used to get information about spent outputs, not unspent outputs. It returns the txid and index where an output is spent, which implies that the output has already been spent.

getspentinfo

Returns the txid and index where an output is spent.

Arguments:
{
 "txid" (string) The hex string of the txid
 "index" (number) The start block height
}

Result:
{
 "txid" (string) The transaction id
 "index" (number) The spending input index
 ,...
}

Examples:
> verus getspentinfo '{"txid": "0437cd7f8525ceed2324359c2d0ba26006d92d856a9c20fa0241106ee5a597c9", "index": 0}'
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getspentinfo", "params": [{"txid": "0437cd7f8525ceed2324359c2d0ba26006d92d856a9c20fa0241106ee5a597c9", "index": 0}] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
